daveayan.gherkinsalad.components
Interface TextEnterable

All Superinterfaces:
BrowserElement, CanBeDisabled, CanBeEnabled, Clickable, Nullable
All Known Implementing Classes:
NullBrowserElement, TextArea, TextField, TinyMceEditor
public interface TextEnterable
extends Clickable

Interface that indicates that text can be entered in the BrowserElement. Unless absolutely needed do not make your page object implement this interface directly. Instead make them extend TextField or TextArea.

Method Summary
 void append_text_if_enabled(String text)
          Append the text passed in as parameter to the existing text.
 void enter_text_if_enabled(String text)

append_text_if_enabled

void append_text_if_enabled(String text)
Append the text passed in as parameter to the existing text. The text may be appended before the existing text or after the existing text, depending on the implementation

Parameters:
text -
